mapper.insert:
SELECT keyword_seq.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO InviteCard (index_id, CLIENT_ID, PLACE_ID_1, PLACE_ID_2, PLACE_ID_3, TITLE ,TAGET_DATE ,TAGET_TIME, MEETING_CONTENT, MEETING_PARTICIPANTS, CARD_SKIN, PLACE_ID_1_SET,PLACE_ID_2_SET,PLACE_ID_3_SET) VALUES (#{indexId}, #{CLIENT_ID}, #{PLACE_ID_1},#{PLACE_ID_2}, #{PLACE_ID_3}, #{TITLE}, #{TAGET_DATE}, #{TAGET_TIME}, #{MEETING_CONTENT}, #{MEETING_PARTICIPANTS}, #{CARD_SKIN}, #{PLACE_ID_1_SET} , #{PLACE_ID_2_SET}, #{PLACE_ID_3_SET} )
